author: mkienenb
msg: Fixed TODO: comments so they show up correctly as Eclipse tasks.

author: mkienenb
msg: Document cayenne.test.connection property default value of "internal_embedded_datasource".

author: mkienenb
msg: Default to internal_embedded_datasource if no cayenne.test.connection property is specified.  [CAY-274]
This is an embedded HSQLDB instance.   The classpath is modified appropriately to add hsqldb.jar in this case.

I'm not entirely thrilled about using "internal_embedded_datasource" as it could potentially conflict with a user name, but the build script needs to have a name so it can create a report directory.  (Originally I tried keeping cayenne.test.connection undefined)
I'm also not sure if CayenneTestResource is the best place to hardcode the DataSourceInfo.

author: mkienenb
msg: Added invalidatedIds to testRootEvent and replaced deprecated constructor.
